io.github.jeremysher.vector

Class Vector

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.jeremysher.vector.Vector

  • public class Vector
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods for vector operations.
    Author:
    Jeremy Sher

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Vector()
      Creates a new 3D vector of zero magnitude.
      Vector(double[] set)
      Creates a new n-dimensional vector.
      Vector(double mag, Angle theta)
      Creates a new 2D vector with a magnitude and a direction.
      Vector(double x, double y)
      Creates a new 2D vector.
      Vector(double x, double y, double z)
      Creates a new 3D vector.

    • Method Detail

      • scale

        public Vector scale(double s)
        Returns this vector multiplied by a scalar value.
        Parameters:
        s - The scalar value to multiply the vector.
        Returns:
        The scaled vector.

      • sum

        public static Vector sum(Vector a,
                         Vector b)
        Returns the sum of two vectors. If the vectors are not same-dimensional, then the resultant vector has an amount of dimensions equal to the greatest-dimensional vector.
        Parameters:
        a - The first vector to add.
        b - The second vector to add.
        Returns:
        The resultant vector.

      • sum

        public static Vector sum(Vector[] vectors)
        Returns the sum of n vectors. If the vectors are not same-dimensional, then the resultant vector has an amount of dimensions equal to the greatest-dimensional vector.
        Parameters:
        vectors - The set of vectors to add.
        Returns:
        The resultant vector.

      • difference

        public static Vector difference(Vector a,
                                Vector b)
        Returns the difference between two vectors; specifically, the second minus the first.
        Parameters:
        a - The first vector.
        b - The second vector.
        Returns:
        The difference between the two vectors.

      • dot

        public static double dot(Vector a,
                         Vector b)
        Returns the dot product of two vectors.
        Parameters:
        a - The first vector.
        b - The second vector.
        Returns:
        The result of the dot product.

      • cross

        public static Vector cross(Vector a,
                           Vector b)
        Returns the cross product of two vectors, only for vectors of 3 dimensions or less.
        Parameters:
        a - The first vector.
        b - The second vector.
        Returns:
        The result of the cross product.

      • makeUnitVector

        @Deprecated
public static Vector makeUnitVector(Vector p,
                                                 Vector q)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a unit vector that points from position p to position q. Instead of this method, use normalize() to make a unit vector.
        Parameters:
        p - Point 1.
        q - Point 2.
        Returns:
        The unit vector from point 1 to point 2.

      • normalize

        Normalize this vector.
        Returns:
        The resulting unit vector.
